message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. This is a great deal, considering the value it brings to the table. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can come to a more agreeable price. Would you consider selling it to me for $12000?

Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $12000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13500. This is a fair price considering the value it brings, and I think it's a great compromise. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I think $13000 would be a fair price for both of us, considering the value of the product. Would you be able to meet at this price?

Hi Bob, I'm close to accepting your offer, but I still need to get a bit closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you at $13250. This is a fair compromise, considering the value the product brings. What do you think?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. I am willing to pay $13000 for the product. I believe this price reflects its value while staying within my budget. Could we agree on this price?

Hi Bob, I understand that we're getting close to a deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $13500. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm willing to meet you at $13400. This is my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll sell the product to you. What do you think?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence in negotiating. I am willing to pay $13200 for the product. I believe this price reflects its value while staying within my budget. Could we agree on this price?
